ygData.subject: Thanks for the Advice!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the help Sadia and everyone else!! I hadn t thought about getting to OT through Oasis. I had planned to make the boring boat trip back to BB, and
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the help Sadia and everyone else!! I
hadn't thought about getting to OT through Oasis. I had
planned to make the boring boat trip back to BB, and
start from there to Firiona Vie. Good Advice!! My
ranger friend and I joined a group last night at the
Zone ent in Lake Rathe. made it 1/2 way to lvl 19 in
just 2 1/2 hours of constant battle. Between loot
splits, I made about 10pp, and also picked up the skull
that gives you +40 mana and +5 Mag resist. (i think --
can't remember it's name right now). <br><br>The aviak
groups were in their low to mid 20s with no room for a
still lvl 18 druid and ranger. We soloed some yellow
aviaks on the plains of SK, but they hit pretty hard. We
had nearly taken down one yellow, when a red joined
in. UGH -- my first time in SK, and I was trying to
find the Lake Rathe zone!!!! Good think I had SOW, and
got a snare off. I waited at the zone to Rathe for my
freind, and then saw an ominous and foreboding message--
"Your snare spell has worn off" - TIME TO ZONE!!!!
<br><br>This club is pretty good - but i've noticed a lot of
druids posting here. We have more/better tales than
bards these days!!! Pretty soon, Verant will have to
let us pick of a mandolin!!! <br><br>Xela (Orcbane or
BearFreind or Wolfsire-- can't decide yet -- hehe)<br>Druid
of the 18th Season<br>In the service of Mother
Tunare, on Xev
